name: impt
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2))

stmt.origin: mpdi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2))
-| wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w1)
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2))
-| wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w1)
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), wi(w1, w2)))

|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2))
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2))
-| wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w0)
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))), w2))

comment: Importation theorem ~ imp expressed with primitive connectives. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 20-Jul-2013.)
